Txt_Bar_Message_Start_01.Text: Welcome to Patty's Party Planning Place!

Txt_Bar_Message_Start_02.Text: If you want to find new party members, this is the place to be! Same goes if you want to ditch them, for that matter.

Txt_Bar_Message_Top.Text: So, how can I help you today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_CannotDropOff.Text:
You want to drop someone off?
Erm, sorry to break it to you, but you're all alone right now, {LEADER}.

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffTop.Text: So, who do you want to leave behind?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffHero.Text: Uhh, I don't think so. If {HERO}'s hanging out here with me, who'll be out there telling you guys what to do?

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffDeath_01.Text: Hold on! You want me to take in {WORD} like that? What kind of place do you think I'm running here!?

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffDeath_02.Text: Oh, I get it. Too short on funds to pay for a resurrection, huh?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffAbnormalStatus.Text: So you want to leave {WORD} here, right? Oof, <IfGender_WORD(he's,she's,they've)> definitely seen better days...

Txt_Bar_Message_ReplaceSelectDeath.Text: Hmm... Well, this is frowned on in party-planning circles, but I'll take {WORD}'s coffin off your hands.

Txt_Bar_Message_ReplaceSelectDeathCancel.Text: Well, in that case, show some respect and pony up already! The poor thing...

Txt_Bar_Message_ReplaceSelect.Text: What shall we do about {WORD}, then?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOff_01.Text: So you want to leave {WORD} here, right?

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOff_02.Text: Got it. Looks like you can have a rest for a while, {WORD}.

Txt_Bar_Message_Replace_01.Text: So you want to swap {WORD} out, is that right?

Txt_Bar_Message_Replace_02.Text: In that case, who's going to take their place?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_CannotReplace.Text:
You're kidding, right?
You can't have a party made up of nothing but a bunch of coffins!

Txt_Bar_Message_PickUpSelect.Text: So, who do you want to take along with you?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_CannotPickUp.Text: Yikes! I'm afraid there isn't anyone available to join your party. Sorry!

Txt_Bar_Message_PickUp_01.Text:
You want {WORD} to join you?
No problemo!

Txt_Bar_Message_PickUp_02.Text:
Yoo hooo! {WORD}!
{LEADER}'s here to see you!

Txt_Bar_Message_Sort.Text: I'll put anything your friend isn't using in your bag there, okay?

Txt_Bar_Message_SortFirst.Text: Otherwise, you might lose track of something important!

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffAgain.Text: Do you want to drop anyone else off?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_PickUpAgain.Text: Can I fetch anyone else for you while you're here?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_CannotPickUpPartyMAX_01.Text: But you've already got plenty of company there as it is!

Txt_Bar_Message_CannotPickUpPartyMAX_02.Text: You'll have to leave someone behind if you want to add a new member to your party.

Txt_Bar_Message_CannotViewRoster.Text: Yikes! I'm afraid I don't have any of your party members staying with me at the moment.

Txt_Bar_Message_ViewRosterTop.Text: Come to reappraise your options, eh?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_TopAgain.Text: Can I do anything else for you today?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_Finish.Text: Then we're done! Call again soon!

Txt_Bar_Message_DropOffOnlyLend.Text: Wait a second, if you leave them with me then your party'll be nothing but volunteers!

Txt_Bar_Message_LendFirst.Text:
If you're feeling kind, you can sign up your party members here to go lend someone else a helping hand.<KEY_WAIT>
Anyone you register with me will be able to join another entirely different adventure.<KEY_WAIT>
Now, that's not to say they'll up and vanish from your party or anything!<KEY_WAIT>
They'll just be available to help other adventurers out if they're down on their luck.

Txt_Bar_Message_LendNone.Text: Hmm, doesn't look like you've got anyone to send off right now.

Txt_Bar_Message_LendTop.Text: So, who were you thinking might be helper material?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_LendTop2.Text: Anyone else you want to send off to help an adventurer in need?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_LendReregistration.Text: Oh, you want to sign up {WORD} again? Sure thing!<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_LendChange.Text: Just so you know, you've got {WORD2} on volunteer duty right now. Are you okay with lil' ol' {WORD} taking their place?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_LendDecide.Text: Alright! Then it's {WORD}'s turn to aid an adventurer in need.

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowFirst.Text: In need of some help, are we? Well, you're in luck; I can let you borrow adventurers from other parties if they've signed up with me.

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowNone.Text: Oh dear... No one's actually signed up yet. I'm sure things'll change soon!

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowTop.Text: So, which one of these fine adventuring folk would you like to come lend you a hand?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowTop2.Text: Well, who would you like to help you out then?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowReturnConfirm.Text: Are you really okay with saying bye to {WORD}? You two look like the best of buddies to me.

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowReturnDecide.Text: Alrighty. I'll move everything {WORD} had into your bag, then.

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowReturnNoLive.Text: Wait, but {WORD}'s the only living person left in your party! You should probably hang on to <IfGender_WORD(him,her,them)> for now...

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowReturnCancel.Text: Oh, not quite ready to say farewell to {WORD} yet? It's alright, I'm bad at goodbyes too.

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowSelect.Text: So you want {WORD} to lend you a helping hand?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowPartyAdd.Text: Will you be taking {WORD} out with you right away?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowPartyChange.Text: Hmm, looks like you've already got a full house to me. Do you want to ask one of your pals to take it easy here for a bit?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowPartySelect.Text: Alrighty. Whose turn is it to take a load off, then?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowPartySelect2.Text: Who else would you like to give a break then?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowPartyToBar.Text: Okay, {WORD}! Time to take a load off. I'll put everything <IfGender_WORD(he hasn't,she hasn't,they haven't)> got equipped in your bag for you.

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowAddBarMember.Text: Don't worry, {WORD}'ll be right here whenever you want to pick <IfGender_WORD(him,her,them)> up again.

Txt_Bar_Message_Find.Text:
Feeling like your party's still short a few pals?<KEY_WAIT>
Well, you could always try talking to any adventurer that happens to be here, but your best bet is to head upstairs.<KEY_WAIT>
I promise my man up there will be able to find you the exact type of adventurer you're looking for, or my name isn't Patty!

Txt_Bar_Message_Help.Text: Feeling like helping out another adventurer, or is it you that's in need of some aid?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_HelpAgain.Text: Anything else I can help you with?<NO_INPUT>

Txt_Bar_Message_BorrowDecideSystem.Text: <Cap><DefSgl_WORD> has been signed up as Adventure Log {VALUE}'s volunteer.
